content.description: Sit start in the crimp slot and make a big move straight back to the ledge, cruise out left along the ledge and gain the arete, that’s where your pump shows, make a couple good slaps to the top.
content.location: Walk uphill and to the left, the climb starts in the overhanging roof.

content.description: Sit start on the first problem you see as you walk up hill? Yep. Great little warm up on cool holds, top out is a little sloppy but there are some holes up there.
content.location: As you walk up hill to the main boulder it’s right in front of you.

content.description: Sit start at the crimp slot make the move out and then right to gain some good holds, do some foot work to gain the slower jug that feels like a nice boob.give it a gentle squeeze and put some loving on that top out...named after the Pervy Sage.

This area is usually pretty secluded and there is also a trail that will take you out to an old mill if you like old buildings. The climbing here ranges from V0 to V8 and is most very steep roof climbing. It seems like there would be a lot of Eliminates but the lines that were created are pretty pure. Super fun area heavily and shaded!
